Sermons » God is in the Boat - Mark 4:35-41

God is in the Boat - Mark 4:35-41

Author: 
Pastor Paul Craig
Audio: 
Date: 
Sunday, April 21, 2013 - 10:30am
Sermon Series: 
Study of Mark

Pastor Paul continues in the Gospel of Mark.  In this sermon he talks about the purpose of the parables, and how the message is revealed.  The reference is Mark 4:35-41
